articles.author: Paul Myerberg
articles.title: College football midseason All-America team led by Michael Penix - USA TODAY
articles.description: The college football season has reached the halfway point so it's time to select the USA TODAY Sports midseason All-America team.
articles.content:
If there's a no-doubt star to put at the top of the USA TODAY Sports midseason All-America team, it's Washington quarterback Michael Penix Jr.
The Heisman Trophy leader at the midway point has been … [+4145 chars]

articles.title: 'I am not a threat': Hundreds gather for vigil mourning 6-year-old Palestinian-American boy who was stabbed to death near Chicago - CNN
